Text:
function RYU_EP05_10()
    -- .承-3【2月第2週】「瀟洒なメイドを目指して」
    SaveData.Title = "瀟洒なメイドを目指して"

    -- //BG：男子部教室（夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM11.wav",0)

    MSG([[ From the very next day, I underwent training far beyond the maid lessons I had experienced before. ]])

    -- //BU：モブ生徒メイド
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB10ab")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "Alright, your greeting form wasn’t graceful enough. Do it again." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI07da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Maid・Sad
 "I-I'm sorry..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "Also, never take your eyes off your master. When you speak, always look at your master. You have to be able to read what they're thinking by looking into their eyes." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "The promise with the Ryuguuin family is this weekend. You only have three days of practice left, right? If you don’t give it your all, you won’t make it in time!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2064.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Maid・Serious
 "I-I'll do my best! I'll make it on time!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：モブメイド、オウガ（通常）
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_OGA01aa")
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,300,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,100,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_OGA01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(55,100,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0427.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smile
 "As expected of the devilish Yurikawa. She shows no mercy even to her own 'princess,' Ms. Erika." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "No, I’m just a maid right now. The whole 'princess' thing doesn’t matter." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "Erika, aiming to master being a maid in three days is basically an impossible game. I’m seriously going full-on Spartan training, so don’t cry, okay?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2065.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Maid・Serious
 "Y-Yes! It’s to meet Ms. Uran, after all! I’ll do my best!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：ダリア（通常）、オウガ（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01aa")
LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
LAYER_POSITION(60,800,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,600,0,100,500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0597.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Wink
 "Still, it’s impressive you thought of this. Taking Erika as a maid to accompany you yourself." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_OGA01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(55,100,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0428.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smile
 "I’ve already told the Ryuguuin family about the Rokujou family's excellent maid. They won’t stop you from taking her along." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0429.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Smile
 "As long as she’s in maid attire, no one will recognize her, and even if they’re somewhat suspicious, no one would dare complain about another family’s maid." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0598.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "The real issue is whether she can acquire enough grace to avoid suspicion. We can only hope for Erika’s hard work." ]])

    -- //BU：モブ生徒メイド
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB10ab")
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI07ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2066.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Maid・Smile
 "Good morning. I’m Mina, the Rokujou family’s maid." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0046.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "Ah, that greeting was natural and good. Let’s not forget that feeling and repeat it a hundred more times." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI07ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2067.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Maid・Flustered
 "A hundred!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0047.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "Don’t talk back. A maid does what she’s told. If you’re told to come, you come—even in front of classmates or your admired ‘princess’—a maid shows herself in her maid outfit." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2068.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Maid・Serious
 "G-Good morning. I’m Mina, the Rokujou family’s maid." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "Your expression stiffened. Next time, relax a little more. We’ll start counting from zero again. This training won’t end until you finish all one hundred, so be prepared." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI07da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2069.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Maid・Sad
 "Eek..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ That’s how I kept training as a maid during breaks for both the boys' and girls' divisions, and also from the boys’ division ending until locking up, continuously. ]])

    MSG([[ And finally, the day of the appointment with the Ryuguuin family arrived— ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_11")
end
